mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id,dis.address,sh.shop_name,rid.rider_name,dis.create_time,o.status,dis.delivery_fee FROM kz_distribution dis LEFT JOIN kz_order o ON dis.order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN kz_shop sh ON dis.shop_id = sh.id LEFT JOIN kz_rider rid ON dis.rider_id = rid.id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}
